author: WearGa

changelog.release_notes:
• Updated for the latest Pebble firmware and SDK (v3.2)
• The game now saves progress just before equipping any new equipment or upgrades. So if you do encounter any issues purchasing or equipping the Mothership, the next time you load the app your progress should be restored and the correct item purchased and equipped.

Bug fix:
• A problem with the Mothership has now been resolved, and you can now purchase it successfully
Pixel Miner v2.0 redesigned and updated with full color support for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel
Updated for the new Pebble SDK 2.6.1

Contains a bug fix to stop the app crashing when trying to equip some of the later equipment items (e.g. Excavator or Dragon) if the device was running low on memory. The miner now only mines in one direction (from left to right), in order to reduce the memory usage of the app.
Keep mining!

Bug fixes:
• Fixed the pixels value decreasing if the value is already close to the maximum number, and you are trying to sell multiple items of treasure at once

• Selling Treasure: You can now sell all items of a particular type by pressing and holding the sell button 
• Equipment List: When entering the Equipment menu, it will highlight the next available item to purchase by default 
• Multipliers List: When entering the Multiplier menu, it will highlight the next available item to purchase by default 

*** EXISTING PIXEL MINER PLAYERS PLEASE NOTE *** 
If you upgrade from a previous version of Pixel Miner, you will be required to unload the application and then load this new version. At present this unfortunately causes the game save data to be removed, so if you don't want to start your game from the beginning please don't upgrade yet. We are working with Pebble to find a solution that allows the save data to be maintained with an application upgrade, and will update you as soon as we can! Keep mining!

description:
Become the greatest miner in the Pixelverse. How deep can you go?

Pixel Miner has been redesigned and upgraded with full color support on Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel.

"One of the greatest and most pointless games I have ever had the pleasure or wasting my life on" – Ty Gadberry
